data.author: Jochen Sprickerhof
data.message:
Move pub_rviz_markers_ to it's own callback queue (#193)

waitForSubscriber used to call ros::spinOnce() which could trigger
callbacks from other topics in other threads. In case those have a lock
to only get called once, this would look the visual_tools thread.

Closes: #146

data.author: Michael Görner
data.message:
spin independent thread for RemoteControl (#224)

Avoid deadlocks and cross-thread effects with other callbacks.

data.author: AndyZe
data.message:
For ABCD planes: better comments, ensure the plane equation is satisfied. (#120)

* Better comments, ensure the plane equation is satisfied.

* Fix very small typo

* ABCD plane: use fabs(D) rather than -D

* A more readable plane calculation.

* Better comment on plane parameters.

* Initialize C to 0

* Remove unnecessary line

Co-Authored-By: Henning Kayser <henningkayser@picknik.ai>
